screensaver.name: sproingies
screensaver._description:
Sproingies, version 5.14.
Slinky-like creatures walk down an infinite staircase and occasionally explode!
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slinky http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Q%2Abert http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marble_Madness
